TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HotSpot extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class HotSpot Implements IStateManager
public ref class HotSpot abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 实现所有作用点形状共有的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to all hot spot shapes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建实例的抽象类。You cannot directly create instances of the abstract class. 相反，由继承此类， ，和类来为作用点提供的常见的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the , , and classes to provide the common basic functionality for a hot spot. 你必须从中派生类，以创建一个表示你定义的唯一形状的自定义的作用点类。You must derive from the class to create a custom hot spot class that represents a unique shape that you define. 但是，你可以定义使用的大多数形状， ，和类。However, you can define most shapes using the , , and classes. 当中单击控件、 页面导航到 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。When a in an control is clicked, the page either navigates to a URL, generates a postback to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到的 URL，将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要将发布回服务器，设置属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 使用属性指定的名称对象。Use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名称将传递中事件数据时单击对象。This name will be passed in the event data when the object is clicked. 如果你想对象，不让任何行为将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. 或者，可以使用属性包含控件以指定对象的行为。Alternately, you can use the property on the containing control to specify a object's behavior. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写下面的成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type. 类为抽象类，因此不能直接实例化。The class is abstract and therefore cannot be instantiated directly.

Public Overridable Property AccessKey As String

summary.span: 获取或设置使您可以快速导航至 区域的访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the region.

value.span: 用于快速导航至 区域的访问键。

span.span: The access key for quick navigation to the region.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的键盘快捷方式区域。Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for a region. 这样，你能够快速导航到区域键盘上按 ALT 键和指定的字符的密钥。This allows you to navigate quickly to the region by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如，设置的访问键区域保存到字符串"D"指示用户可以导航到该控件通过按 ALT + D。For example, setting the access key of a region to the string "D" indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 仅是单字符字符串可用于进行属性。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果你尝试将此属性设置为一个值，既不是`null`， ，也不是单字符字符串，将引发异常。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅在 Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

exception.span: 指定的访问键不是 、空字符串 ("") 也不是单字符字符串。

span.span: The specified access key is neither , an empty string (""), nor a single character string.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AlternateText { get; set; }
.property instance string AlternateText
Public Overridable Property AlternateText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置替换文字，该替换文字在图像不可用或是呈现到不支持图像的浏览器时在 控件中代替 对象显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text to display for a object in an control when the image is unavailable or renders to a browser that does not support images.

value.span: 当 控件的图像不可用时，代替 显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the when the control's image is unavailable.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示的文本对象在控制指定的图像属性是不可用。Use the property to specify the text to display for a object in an control when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 当控件呈现为不支持映像，而不是显示图像的浏览器，它将超链接呈现为每个中控件。When an control is rendered to a browser that does not support images, instead of displaying an image, it renders a hyperlink for each in the control. 控件中检索要显示从每个超链接的文本每个属性。The control retrieves the text to display for each hyperlink from the property for each . 当用户单击超链接之一时，则其行为类似通过任一导航到指定的 URL，生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。When a user clicks one of the hyperlinks, it behaves like a by either navigating to a specified URL, generating a postback to the server, or doing nothing. 当控件呈现为支持的工具提示功能的值的浏览器属性显示的工具提示为。When the control renders to a browser that supports the ToolTips feature, the value of the property is displayed as a ToolTip for the . 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode
Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件中的 对象时 的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的行为对象在控制单击。Use the property to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`| 使用由 控件的 属性设置的行为。The uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控件未定义行为，对象导航到的 URL。If the control does not define the behavior, the objects navigate to a URL.| |`Inactive`| 不具有任何行为。The does not have any behavior.| |`Navigate`| 定位到 URL。The navigates to a URL.| |`PostBack`| 生成到服务器的回发。The generates a postback to the server.| 你可以指定上的行为属性的控件或在的每个单独的属性对象。You can specify behavior on either the property of the control or on the property of each individual object. 如果设置这两个属性，属性指定针对每个单个对象将优先于属性控件。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.NotSet`为的单个属性对象，从包含获取其行为控件的属性。If you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, the gets its behavior from the containing control's property. 在此方案中，如果控件的属性或者未设置为一个值，或设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`，默认行为是导航到的 URL。In this scenario, if the control's property is either not set to a value or is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, the default behavior is to navigate to a URL. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.Navigate`为属性对象，单击作用点区域时，对象将定位到 URL。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property of a object, the object navigates to a URL when the hot spot region is clicked. 使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.PostBack`为属性对象，对象生成到服务器的回发时单击。If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property of a object, the object generates a post back to the server when the is clicked. 使用属性指定的名称。Use the property to specify a name for the . 此名称将传递中在回发事件发生时的事件数据。This name will be passed in the event data on when a postback event occurs. 在回发时单击后，引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 以编程方式控制时执行的操作回发是单击，提供的事件处理程序事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要使所有中的对象控件具有相同的行为，请设置针对每个单个属性对象传递给`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或者未指定的值属性。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行为的中的对象控制、 设置针对每个单个属性对象为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`， `HotSpotMode.PostBack`，或`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件的属性或属性它所包含的对象不设置为一个值，或者设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`，默认情况下的行为是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on the objects it contains is either not set to a value or set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.Inactive`为属性，单击时其对象不具有任何行为。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 此值可用于创建更大的活动作用点内处于非活动状态的作用点。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 提供此选项以允许你创建更复杂的作用点区域内控件。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot-spot zones within an control. 若要创建活动的作用点内的某个非活动区域，必须指定在活动的作用点之前处于非活动状态的作用点控件。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如，以下通过指定非活动状态的圆形作用点中较大 active 圆形作用点定义一个活动环形：For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ```

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 将 对象以前保存的视图状态还原到该对象。

span.span: Restores the object's previously saved view state to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 主要由控件开发人员使用方法，派生的自定义实现从时类。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 此方法还原视图状态信息对象从已保存的上一个页面请求方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

summary.span: 自页回发到服务器开始，将更改保存到 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 对象的视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the object's view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该对象关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员使用成员，派生的自定义实现从时类。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件的生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对于 IIS 5.0 和 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率`ViewState`属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

virtual System::Object ^ System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::SaveViewState;

summary.span: 自页上次回发到服务器开始，将更改保存到 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the last time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 对象的视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the object's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法以将保存的视图状态区域。Typically, you should use the method to save the view state for the region. 方法是显式接口成员的实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 可以使用它时，才实例被强制转换为接口。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于跟踪视图状态的自定义实现对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for tracking view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法以将保存的对象的视图状态更改。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to save view-state changes for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: void IStateManager.TrackViewState ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed
Sub TrackViewState () Implements IStateManager.TrackViewState
virtual void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::TrackViewState;

summary.span: 指示 区域跟踪对其视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Instructs the region to track changes to its view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法以启动跟踪视图状态更改区域。Typically, you should use the method to start tracking view-state changes for the region. 方法是显式接口成员的实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 可以使用它时，才实例被强制转换为接口。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于跟踪视图状态的自定义实现对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for tracking view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法以初始化对象的视图状态跟踪。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to initialize view-state tracking for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual short TabIndex { get; set; }
.property instance int16 TabIndex
Public Overridable Property TabIndex As Short
public: virtual property short TabIndex { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 区域的选项卡索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab index of the region.
The tab index of the region.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定的 tab 键索引Web 窗体页上的区域。Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a region on the Web Forms page. 按 TAB 键时，Web 服务器控件接收焦点的顺序由的每个控件的属性。When you press the TAB key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 当最初加载页时，当按下 TAB 键时获得焦点的第一项是在地址栏。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the TAB key is pressed is the address bar. 接下来，Web 窗体页上的控件 tab 键以升序基于的值的按顺序属性的每个控件，从最小正数，则为非 0 值开始。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多个控件共享相同的选项卡索引，则控件将在 Web 窗体页上声明了它们的顺序接收焦点。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最后，具有选项卡索引为零的控件是选项卡式到声明它们的顺序。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零的 tab 键索引的控件将呈现`tabindex`属性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 你可以删除从通过设置 tab 键顺序的区域为负值的属性。You can remove a region from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 仅在 Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later.

exception.span: 指定的选项卡索引不在 -32768 和 32767 之间。

span.span: The specified tab index is not between -32768 and 32767.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击导航至 URL 的 对象时在其中显示链接到的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 目标窗口或框架，单击导航至 URL 的 对象时在其中加载链接到的网页。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的框架或显示网页的窗口时所链接到单击导航到 URL 的对象。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked. 此属性才起作用时，才属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，以导航到的 URL。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, to navigate to a URL. 如果未设置此属性，浏览器或具有焦点的窗口时刷新单击对象。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the object is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许对定位标记元素的属性。The `target` attribute on ANCHOR elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > [!CAUTION] > 我们强烈建议，在创建时可访问网页，你避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。We strongly recommend that, when creating accessible Web pages, you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），除了下列特殊值，其中以下划线开头范围的开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 或更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 or later supports the `_search` target value.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 返回 对象的此实例的 表示形式。

span.span: Returns the representation of this instance of a object.

returns.span: 表示此 对象的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回表示当前的字符串对象。The method returns a string that represents the current object. 例如，如果当前是的一个实例类，调用此方法返回的字符串"CircleHotSpot"。For example, if the current is an instance of the class, calling this method returns the string "CircleHotSpot".

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void TrackViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub TrackViewState ()
protected: virtual void TrackViewState();

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪对其视图状态所做的更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在该对象的 对象中。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's object.

summary.span: 通过 属性可访问此对象。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员使用成员，派生的自定义实现从时类。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 由 ASP.NET 自动调用此方法时初始化对象。This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the object is initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState
Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含 区域的视图状态信息的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the region's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员使用成员，派生的自定义实现从时类。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 为了在 HTTP 请求之间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用属性，它是实例的类中，以存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use the property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值时处理后续请求中作为变量传递到隐藏的 HTML 元素。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden HTML element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 默认情况下，情况下，启用所有服务器控件的视图状态但是某些情况下在其中你将想要禁用它。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典和如何使用它们的信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).
